title: 我的mc任何版本都玩不了了，甚至是原版。
author: zuoyinglan
txt_content:
自从升到mac os x 10.9 后，一‘Enter Game’就崩了。就java大大---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Sorry :(
Time: 13-6-19 ??5:36
Description: Failed to start game
org.lwjgl.LWJGLException: Could not get the JAWT interface
